article_title: Ohio will close all its bars and restaurants to slow down coronavirus
article_description: As coronavirus picks up steam in the U S  Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced the state would close down all its bars and restaurants Sunday night   to keep people from infecting one another  This is a potent social distancing measure  which means keeping at
